Deleting a scene or pop-up from the Project can be done in the following way:

- Open the **Project editor**.

- In the **sidebar**, open the **three-dot menu** of the scene or pop-up you want to delete and click **Delete**.

The scene or pop-up will be removed from the sidebar.

> Info

It’s not possible to remove a scene or pop-up that is currently being used in a Storyboard. Remove it from all Storyboards first and try again.

![Error message indicating Scene 'Scene 1' cannot be deleted due to storyboard usage.](data:image/png;base64,)Warning message when trying to delete a scene or pop-up that is being used in a Storyboard

> Irreversible action

Deleted scenes and pop-ups will be permanently removed from the sidebar and can’t be recovered.
